title: gifting people
body: I have recently added someone and now I want to gift them something but they aren't on the list although it says that all my friends are on the list. I've refreshed and restarted several times but nothing as changed. If there's anything you can do to fix this please. Thank you .

replies.body:
Wolfess with the assist! {{summoner:31}} 

It's a small point that a lot of people forget (myself included sometimes -_-') that you must be friends with a person for over 24 hours before you'll be able to gift them. If it's been over a day already, check out the other [**gifting requirements**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964) to see if it's one of those reasons instead.
